Description: Other ways the individual's name is displayed. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
URL, e.g., individual's home page address
Unique identifier (ORCID ID) of the individual
Unique identifier (Synapse Profile ID) of the individual. See identifer in the url of the synapse profile page.
Last known institutional affiliation of the individual.
CSBC/PSON working group(s) of which the individual is a member (current and former). Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
Committee or working group chair role(s) the individual fulfilled (current and former). Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
Consent from individual to display Person information in the CCKP
The denormalized manifest for person submission.
Grant number(s) associated with the person. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
Consortium(s) associated with the person. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
A list of the pubmed Ids associated with the person. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.

A list of the dataset aliases (An alias of the dataset must be unique. Can be the GEO identifier such as GSE12345, or a DOI. No Greek Letters) associated with the person. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
A list of the tool names associated with the person. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
A list of educational resource identifiers associated with the person. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
A unique primary key that enables record updates using schematic.
